record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - March 10, 2008)

[Page: H1432]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I was absent today from three rollcall votes due to family obligations in Arizona that required my attention.
Had I been present, I would have voted in favor of H. Res. 537, rollcall vote No. 108; H.R. 3196, rollcall vote No. 109; and H.R. 4166, rollcall vote No. 110.
